amendment.description: To improve efficient use of sensitive compartmented information facilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1803 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1803 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Warner to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4186) To improve efficient use of sensitive compartmented information facilities.
